channel.title: Pork on Lane Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in Pork on Lane Recipes

item.title: Pepperonchini Pork
item.description: Super simple, super flavorful, super cheap. One of my favorites to make as a poor college student as it’s two ingredients and gives me delicious meals for a week plus! If anyone’s interested in how I went about constructing this sandwich, here it goes! I actually cooked the pork yesterday so this is what I did with some of the leftovers. Usually I just go with the hoagie and provolone combo, but after working in the heat all day today I was craving something with a little more umph and things that are bad for me.
